statements: SELECT * FROM Sales_Representatives ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number, address FROM Sales_Representatives WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified';
SELECT id, name, email, potential_revenue FROM Sales_Representatives WHERE sales_progress > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Sales_Representatives WHERE lead_status = 'Open' ORDER BY potential_revenue DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM Sales_Representatives WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales_Representatives WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified' ORDER BY sales_progress DESC, name ASC;
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM Sales_Representatives ORDER BY potential_revenue DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM Sales_Representatives WHERE potential_revenue > 50000 AND lead_status = 'Cold';
SELECT id, name, email, lead_status FROM Sales_Representatives WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales_Representatives WHERE potential_revenue >= 1000 AND sales_progress < 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM Leads ORDER BY lead_created_at DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source FROM Leads WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified';
SELECT lead_name, lead_created_at FROM Leads WHERE lead_source = 'Website' ORDER BY lead_created_at ASC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status, progress_status FROM Leads INNER JOIN SalesProgress ON Leads.lead_id = SalesProgress.lead_id;
SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source FROM Leads WHERE lead_status='Open';
SELECT * FROM SalesProgress WHERE progress_status='Completed' ORDER BY progress_updated_at DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source, lead_status FROM Leads WHERE lead_created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lead_name, lead_source, progress_description FROM Leads INNER JOIN SalesProgress ON Leads.lead_id = SalesProgress.lead_id;
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_contact FROM leads WHERE lead_status='Active';
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM leads ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_progress WHERE progress_status='Pending' ORDER BY progress_date ASC;
SELECT lead_name, predicted_revenue FROM leads INNER JOIN revenue_prediction ON leads.lead_id = revenue_prediction.lead_id WHERE confidence_level > 80;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'New' ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_contact FROM leads WHERE lead_source = 'Website' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_revenue FROM revenue_prediction WHERE confidence_level >= 90 ORDER BY prediction_date;
SELECT lead_name, progress_date, progress_status FROM leads JOIN sales_progress ON leads.lead_id = sales_progress.lead_id WHERE progress_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY progress_date DESC;

SELECT lead_name, progress_status, confidence_level FROM leads LEFT JOIN sales_progress ON leads.lead_id = sales_progress.lead_id LEFT JOIN revenue_prediction ON leads.lead_id = revenue_prediction.lead_id WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress' AND confidence_level < 80 ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_source, lead_value FROM Leads WHERE lead_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM SalesProgress ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT rep_name, rep_email FROM SalesRepresentatives WHERE rep_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT lead_id, COUNT(progress_id) AS progress_count FROM SalesProgress GROUP BY lead_id HAVING progress_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM Leads WHERE lead_value > 5000;
SELECT rep_name, rep_email FROM SalesRepresentatives ORDER BY rep_name ASC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_source, lead_value FROM Leads WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified' ORDER BY lead_value DESC;
SELECT lead_name, progress_status, progress_date FROM Leads JOIN SalesProgress ON Leads.lead_id = SalesProgress.lead_id WHERE progress_status = 'Closed Won';
SELECT * FROM leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_contact FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified';
SELECT * FROM sales_progress ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT rep_name, rep_contact FROM sales_representatives WHERE rep_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT lead_name, predicted_revenue FROM leads l JOIN revenue_prediction r ON l.lead_id = r.lead_id;
SELECT * FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'Hot';
SELECT lead_name, lead_contact FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'Cold' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_contact, lead_status FROM leads WHERE lead_status = 'Warm' ORDER BY lead_contact DESC;
SELECT l.lead_name, a.activity_description, a.activity_date FROM leads l JOIN activity_log a ON l.lead_id = a.lead_id WHERE a.activity_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY a.activity_date ASC;

SELECT r.rep_name, p.predicted_revenue, p.prediction_date FROM revenue_prediction p JOIN sales_representatives r ON p.lead_id = r.sales_rep_id WHERE p.predicted_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY p.prediction_date DESC;
